timeline.message:
Simplify and correct OSX build instructions

* clarify tool version requirements
* jdk8: must configure with TAR=gtar (environment is ignored)
* jdk11+: configure finds 'gtar' automatically
* the standard 'sed' works fine
* fix build subdirectory name
* spell MacOS consistently

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Looking at https://www.apple.com/ca/macos/catalina/, the original spelling is correct.
timeline.author: pshipton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ Build instructions are available for the following platforms:
 - [Linux :penguin:](#linux)
 - [AIX :blue_book:](#aix)
 - [Windows :ledger:](#windows)
-- [macOS :apple:](#macos)
+- [MacOS :apple:](#MacOS)

replies.bodyText: Ok, I'll switch all references to 'macOS'; I started by correcting the link from 'macos' which targeted 'macOS', but I should have checked on the official spelling.
replies.author: keithc-ca
